id.description: The ID of the abuse report.

status.description: The current status of the report.

abuseType.description: The abuse type of the report.

reopened.description: When the report status is open, this indicates if the report was reopened.

reportedAt.description: The date and time the report was reported at.

updatedAt.description: When the report was updated last.

notifier.description: The email address of the notifier who reported the abuse.

customerId.description: The customer ID of your account.

legalEntityId.description: The legal entity ID of the customer account.

deadline.description: The Deadline before when the report needs to be resolved.

detectedIpAddresses.description: The IP-addresses detected in the report body.

detectedDomainNames.description: The domains detected in the report body.

ipAddresses.description: The IP-addresses the domain resolves to.

attachments.description: All the files attached to the report.

totalMessagesCount.description: Total amount of messages in the report.

latestMessages.description: Array of the last 5 messages in the report.
